title: Did Phil Spector Record an Unreleasable Song to ‘Screw’ His Former Partner?
subtitle: Spector was an American record producer of the 1960s who was described by the writer Tom Wolfe as the “First Tycoon of Teen.”
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: Phil Spector deliberately recorded a unreleasable song called 'The Screw' in order to cheat his former partner out of court-ordered royalty payments.
